title: Fully Expandable and Customizable Create Gantry Crop Farm Tutorial | Minecraft Create Mod 1.20

tasks.task: Construct a fully automatic and customizable crop farm using the Gantry Carriage System.
subtasks: Position the Gantry Carriage on one end of the Gantry Shaft.
Attach Linear Chassis to the Gantry Carriage.
Place harvesters on both sides of the Linear Chassis.
Install redstone contacts at each end of the Gantry Shaft.
Connect redstone links to the redstone contacts.
Set up storage and portable storage interface for crop output.
Plant crops 1 block away from the Gantry Shaft ends.
Connect the Gantry Shaft to two normal shafts and the gear shift.
Configure the toggle power latch with an off switch for the machine.
Assign a unique frequency to the redstone link.
Power the machine using the lever to activate the toggle power latch.
Set up a chute for crop output using hoppers or chutes.
